The capital is Mongo. It was created in 2002 from the former Guéra prefecture. Half of the Zakouma National Park is within the region. ==Departments== The region of Guéra is divided into four departments, namely: *Guéra (capital: Mongo) *Barh Signaka (capital: Melfi) *Abtouyour (capital: Bitkine) *Mangalmé (capital: Mangalmé) ==References== Category:Regions of Chad Category:2002 establishments in Africa
